page.title: 16CHILDRENS GAMES IN DEVIZES.
page.content: There are many types of games played outdoors by children in Devizes most of which involve running and catching skills.Three of these are called Bulldog,Tig and Bad Eggs. One favourite is called Deck.To play it you need a group of people,two of whom are selected to chase.The rest go and hide. The two people who are on 'it' wait a predetermined time before trying to find the people who are hiding. When 'tigged' you become one of the chasers. The first two people to be caught become the chasers in the next game. Children also like to play traditional games on special courts or pitches, whether at school or at a sports centre. Examples of these more organised team games are football, netball,volley-ball,cricket and tennis.
